speed.gloss: the rate of change of distance with respect to time

velocity.gloss: the rate of change of displacement with respect to time

acceleration.gloss: the rate of change of velocity with respect to time

force.gloss: the product of mass and acceleration

weight.gloss: the force due to gravity on a mass

momentum.gloss: the product of mass and velocity

potential_energy_gravitational.gloss: the energy stored due to height in a gravitational field
potential_energy_gravitational.exec: lambda m, g, h: m * g * h

work.gloss: the product of force and displacement in the direction of the force

power.gloss: the rate at which work is done

ohms_law.gloss: the relationship between voltage, current, and resistance

electrical_power.gloss: the rate of electrical energy transfer

coulombs_law.gloss: the electrostatic force between two point charges
coulombs_law.exec: lambda k, q1, q2, r: k * q1 * q2 / (r ** 2)

hookes_law.gloss: the restoring force of a spring is proportional to displacement

frequency.gloss: the number of cycles per unit time

period.gloss: the time required for one complete cycle

ideal_gas_law.gloss: the relationship between pressure, volume, temperature, and moles of gas
ideal_gas_law.exec: lambda n, R, T, V: (n * R * T) / V

centripetal_force.gloss: the force required to keep an object moving in a circular path
centripetal_force.exec: lambda m, v, r: m * (v ** 2) / r

centripetal_acceleration.gloss: the acceleration of an object moving in a circular path

mechanical_advantage_lever.gloss: the ratio of output force to input force for a lever

mechanical_advantage_pulley.gloss: the mechanical advantage of a pulley system
